Equations¶

The links to the description page of the available models and graphics are listed below. \(a^2 + b^2 = c^2 \sqrt{\frac{a}{b}}\).

\begin{eqnarray} y & = & ax^2 + bx + c \\ f(x) & = & x^2 + 2xy + y^2 \end{eqnarray}

texto

(1)¶\[e^{i\pi} + 1 = 0\]
(2)¶\[e^{i\pi} + 1 = 0\]
